Contact Us

Get in Touch

We’d love to hear from you! Whether you’re interested in joining the club, have questions about our events, or want to collaborate, feel free to reach out.

Email

General Inquiries: contact@techclub.edu Events: events@techclub.edu Partnerships: partnerships@techclub.edu

Office Hours

When: Every Wednesday, 4:00 PM - 6:00 PM Where: Student Activity Center, Room 204

Social Media

Stay updated with our latest events, articles, and announcements:

  • GitHub: github.com/techclub
  • LinkedIn: linkedin.com/company/techclub
  • Twitter: @techclub
  • Discord: Join our community server for discussions and announcements

Mailing List

Subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates about upcoming workshops, events, and opportunities.
